fitsKeyInfo.name: CRPIX1
fitsKeyInfo.title: Coordinate system reference pixel
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the X coordinate of the reference pixel in the image

fitsKeyInfo.name: CRPIX2
fitsKeyInfo.title: Coordinate system reference pixel
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Y coordinate of the reference pixel in the image

fitsKeyInfo.name: CRVAL1
fitsKeyInfo.title: Coordinate system value at reference pixel
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Right ascension at the reference pixel

fitsKeyInfo.name: CRVAL2
fitsKeyInfo.title: Coordinate system value at reference pixel
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Declination at the reference pixel

fitsKeyInfo.name: CTYPE1
fitsKeyInfo.title: Name of the coordinate axis
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Projection type RA---TAN

fitsKeyInfo.name: CTYPE2
fitsKeyInfo.title: Name of the coordinate axis
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Projection type DEC—TAN

fitsKeyInfo.name: CD1_1
fitsKeyInfo.title: Projection of unit vector of axis 1 of one coordinate system with respect to axis 1 of the other coordinate system
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Transformation matrix element 1,1

fitsKeyInfo.name: CD1_2
fitsKeyInfo.title: Projection of unit vector of axis 1 of one coordinate system with respect to axis 2 of the other coordinate system
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Transformation matrix element 1,2

fitsKeyInfo.name: CD2_1
fitsKeyInfo.title: Projection of unit vector of axis 2 of one coordinate system with respect to axis 1 of the other coordinate system
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Transformation matrix element 2,1

fitsKeyInfo.name: CD2_2
fitsKeyInfo.title: Projection of unit vector of axis 2 of one coordinate system with respect to axis 2 of the other coordinate system
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Transformation matrix element 2,2

fitsKeyInfo.name: RADECSYS
fitsKeyInfo.title: This is the Frame type
fitsKeyInfo.description: Reference frame of equatorial or ecliptic coordinates

fitsKeyInfo.name: DATE
fitsKeyInfo.title: Date of file creation
fitsKeyInfo.description: The date on which  the HDU was created, in the format specified in the FITS Standard. The old date format was ‘yy/mm/dd’ and may be used only for dates from 1900 through 1999. The new Y2K compliant date format is ‘yyyy-mm-dd’ or ‘yyyy-mm- ddTHH:MM:SS[.sss] ’.

fitsKeyInfo.name: DATE-OBS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Date of the observation
fitsKeyInfo.description: The date of the observation, in the format specified in the FITS Standard. The old date format was ‘yy/mm/dd’ and may be used only for dates from 1900 through 1999. The new Y2K compliant date format is ‘yyyy- mm-dd’ or ‘yyyy- mm- ddTHH:MM:SS[.sss] ’.

fitsKeyInfo.name: EQUINOX
fitsKeyInfo.title: Equinox of celestial coordinate system
fitsKeyInfo.description: The value field shall contain a floating point number giving the equinox in years for the celestial coordinate system in which positions are expressed. The interpretation of epoch depends upon the value of RADESYSa if present: Besselian if the value is FK4 or FK4-NO-E, Julian if the value is FK5; not applicable if the value is ICRS or GAPPT.

fitsKeyInfo.name: OBJECT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Name or type of observed object
fitsKeyInfo.description: The value field shall contain a character string giving a name or type of the object observed. Often ‘TARGNAME’ is used for target name, in which case ‘OBJECT’ can be used to specify the object category.

fitsKeyInfo.name: OBSERVER
fitsKeyInfo.title: Observer who acquired the data
fitsKeyInfo.description: The value field shall contain a character string identifying who acquired the data associated with the header.

fitsKeyInfo.name: RA
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current right ascension
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current right ascension (ICRS, at equinox)

fitsKeyInfo.name: DEC
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current declination
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current declination (ICRS, at equinox)

fitsKeyInfo.name: PARANG
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current parallactic angle
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current parallactic angle (ICRS, at equinox)

fitsKeyInfo.name: AZ
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current Azimuth
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current Azimuth

fitsKeyInfo.name: EL
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current Elevation
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current Elevation

fitsKeyInfo.name: Z
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current Zenith Angle
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current Zenith Angle

fitsKeyInfo.name: HA
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current Hour Angle
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current Hour Angle

fitsKeyInfo.name: AIRMASS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Air Mass
fitsKeyInfo.description: Air Mass (TBD whether plane-parallel, i.e., sec(z), or curvature-corrected)

fitsKeyInfo.name: TELFOCUS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current focus
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current focus (with 10 micrometer precision)

fitsKeyInfo.name: TELFRAT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Telescope F-ratio
fitsKeyInfo.description: Telescope F-ratio (TBD: this is a static quantity)

fitsKeyInfo.name: LST
fitsKeyInfo.title: Local Sidereal Time
fitsKeyInfo.description: Local Sidereal Time

fitsKeyInfo.name: PNTGST
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current state of the pointing system.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current state of the pointing system as enum [SLEWING,TRACKING,INPOSITION].

fitsKeyInfo.name: M3ROT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current M3 position in rotation.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current M3 position in rotation.

fitsKeyInfo.name: M3TILT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current M3 position in tilt.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current M3 position in tilt.

fitsKeyInfo.name: M2TIP
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current M2 position in tip.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current M2 position in tip.

fitsKeyInfo.name: M2TILT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current M2 position in tilt.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current M2 position in tilt.

fitsKeyInfo.name: M2PISTON
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current M2 position in piston.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current M2 position in piston.

fitsKeyInfo.name: M2DECENX
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current M2 position in decenter-x.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current M2 position in decenter-x.

fitsKeyInfo.name: M2DECENY
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current M2 position in decenter-y.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current M2 position in decenter-y.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IMGDISWV
fitsKeyInfo.title: An array of wavelengths. Each provided wavelength value must be unique.
fitsKeyInfo.description: An array of wavelengths. Each provided wavelength value must be unique.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IMGDISWT
fitsKeyInfo.title: An array of weights. They must sum to 1.0.
fitsKeyInfo.description: An array of weights. They must sum to 1.0.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IMGDISVL
fitsKeyInfo.title: An array of atmospheric dispersion values.
fitsKeyInfo.description: An array of atmospheric dispersion values.

fitsKeyInfo.name: INROTANG
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current rotator angle in the XY plane of the FCRSIRIS.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current rotator angle in the XY plane of the FCRSIRIS.

fitsKeyInfo.name: PROTANG
fitsKeyInfo.title: Future IRIS pupil rotation angle in the X,Y plane of the FCRSIRIS-ROT that will be valid at the time indicated by "timestamp" attribute.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Future IRIS pupil rotation angle in the X,Y plane of the FCRSIRIS-ROT that will be valid at the time indicated by "timestamp" attribute.

fitsKeyInfo.name: PA
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current angle between Y axis of FCRSIRIS and Declination axis (ICRS).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current angle between Y axis of FCRSIRIS and Declination axis (ICRS).

fitsKeyInfo.name: OIWFS1PS
fitsKeyInfo.title: 2-element array holding x,y values in the FCRSIRIS-ROT.
fitsKeyInfo.description: 2-element array holding x,y values in the FCRSIRIS-ROT.

fitsKeyInfo.name: OIWFS2PS
fitsKeyInfo.title: 2-element array holding x,y values in the FCRSIRIS-ROT.
fitsKeyInfo.description: 2-element array holding x,y values in the FCRSIRIS-ROT.

fitsKeyInfo.description: 2-element array holding x,y values in the FCRSIRIS-ROT.

fitsKeyInfo.description: Current state of the probe event stream as enum: (SLEWING, TRACKING, INPOSITION)

fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Current Base Position.

fitsKeyInfo.title: This is the Current Cap Position
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the Current Cap Position

fitsKeyInfo.name: FILTER
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current imager filter name.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current imager filter name. When two or more filters are inserted in the science light path, filter names are concatinated with TBD character in the order of wheel number.

fitsKeyInfo.description: Start time of the first pixel read

fitsKeyInfo.name: RST_TIME
fitsKeyInfo.title: Time of the last reset
fitsKeyInfo.description: Time of the last reset

fitsKeyInfo.name: FRM_TIME

fitsKeyInfo.description: Time taken to read all the pixels in the readout frame

fitsKeyInfo.description: Detector ID IMG1/2/3/4 ,SLC/LEN

fitsKeyInfo.description: Exposure number  XXXX 0-9999

fitsKeyInfo.description: Ramp within Exposure [0-99999]

fitsKeyInfo.title: Readout Within Ramp
fitsKeyInfo.description: Readout Within Ramp [0-99999]

fitsKeyInfo.name: COMPLETE
fitsKeyInfo.title: Indicates if Pixels were readout
fitsKeyInfo.description: Indicates if Pixels were readout

fitsKeyInfo.name: CLDSTPX
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position in X axis.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position in X axis.

fitsKeyInfo.name: CLDSTPY
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position in Y axis.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position in Y axis.

fitsKeyInfo.name: CLDSTPTH
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current angle of the rotary stage.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current angle of the rotary stage.

fitsKeyInfo.name: PPMIRRST
fitsKeyInfo.title: Whether the mirror is inserted into the light path or not.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Whether the mirror is inserted into the light path or not, values: (IN, INTERMEDIATE, OUT, UNKNOWN).

fitsKeyInfo.name: FILTWAVE
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current effective filter wavelength.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current effective filter wavelength. Effective wavelength is defined as ... ?

fitsKeyInfo.name: FILTDRFL
fitsKeyInfo.title: Indicates whether a dark filter is inserted or not.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Indicates whether a dark filter is inserted or not.

fitsKeyInfo.name: FILT1POS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of the wheel 1.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of the wheel 1 (as enum: (TBD1, TBD2, TBD3, TBD4, TBD5, TBD6, TBD7, TBD8, TBD9, TBD10, TBD11, TBD12, TBD13, TBD14, THROUGH, HOME, INTERMEDIATE, UNKNOWN).

fitsKeyInfo.name: FILT2POS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of the wheel 2.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of the wheel 2, values: (TBD1, TBD2, TBD3, TBD4, TBD5, TBD6, TBD7, TBD8, TBD9, TBD10, TBD11, TBD12, TBD13, TBD14, THROUGH, HOME, INTERMEDIATE, UNKNOWN).

fitsKeyInfo.name: FILT3POS

fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of the wheel 3, values: (TBD1, TBD2, TBD3, TBD4, TBD5, TBD6, TBD7, TBD8, TBD9, TBD10, TBD11, TBD12, TBD13, TBD14, THROUGH, HOME, INTERMEDIATE, UNKNOWN).

fitsKeyInfo.name: FILT4POS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of the wheel 4.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of the wheel 4, values: (TBD1, TBD2, TBD3, TBD4, TBD5, TBD6, TBD7, TBD8, TBD9, TBD10, TBD11, TBD12, TBD13, TBD14, THROUGH, HOME, INTERMEDIATE, UNKNOWN)

fitsKeyInfo.name: FILT5POS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of the wheel 5.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of the wheel 5, values: (TBD1, TBD2, TBD3, TBD4, TBD5, TBD6, TBD7, TBD8, TBD9, TBD10, TBD11, TBD12, TBD13, TBD14, THROUGH, HOME, INTERMEDIATE, UNKNOWN)

fitsKeyInfo.name: OIWF1SXY
fitsKeyInfo.title: oiwfs1 2-element array holding x,y values.
fitsKeyInfo.description: oiwfs1 2-element array holding x,y values.

fitsKeyInfo.name: OIWF2SXY
fitsKeyInfo.title: oiwfs2 2-element array holding x,y values.
fitsKeyInfo.description: oiwfs2 2-element array holding x,y values.

fitsKeyInfo.name: OIWF3SXY
fitsKeyInfo.title: oiwfs3 2-element array holding x,y values.
fitsKeyInfo.description: oiwfs3 2-element array holding x,y values.

fitsKeyInfo.name: EXPNO
fitsKeyInfo.title: Number of current (if in progress) or last IFS exposure at current dither pattern with current instrument configuration (1-based).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Number of current (if in progress) or last IFS exposure at current dither pattern with current instrument configuration (1-based).

fitsKeyInfo.name: DITHNO
fitsKeyInfo.title: Total number of IFS exposures at current dither pattern.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Total number of IFS exposures at current dither pattern.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IFSSTATE
fitsKeyInfo.title: IFS is currently observing.
fitsKeyInfo.description: IFS is currently observing, means when set the start prepare event was received and will stay that way until the observation is complete is received.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IMSTATE
fitsKeyInfo.title: IMAGER is currently observing.
fitsKeyInfo.description: IMAGER is currently observing, means when set the start prepare event was received and will stay that way until the observation is complete is received.

fitsKeyInfo.name: NUMREADS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Number of raw readouts used in the sampling mode per ramp.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Number of raw readouts used in the sampling mode per ramp. This is the number of raw readouts that are added together before being used in the sampling mode to create a single frame. This number is only used in sample modes of MDS and UTR.

fitsKeyInfo.name: NUMRAMPS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Number of configured ramps.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Number of configured ramps. Each ramp is bounded by resets and is of integration time in length. Each ramp has the sampling mode applied. The resultant raw Science Frame is created by adding the output of each ramp.

fitsKeyInfo.name: RAMPINTT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Integration time, this is the length of time for each ramp.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Integration time, this is the length of time for each ramp.

fitsKeyInfo.name: SAMPMODE
fitsKeyInfo.title: This is the sampling mode.
fitsKeyInfo.description: This is the sampling mode. This could be CDS, MDS or UTR.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IFSSCALE
fitsKeyInfo.title: IFS Scale.
fitsKeyInfo.description: IFS Scale.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IFSMODE
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current IFS mode.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current IFS mode. Indicates if in slicer or lenslet mode.

fitsKeyInfo.name: PCKMRRPS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of pickoff mirror mechanism.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of pickoff mirror mechanism, values: (IN, OUT).

fitsKeyInfo.name: PRSCPPOS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of periscope mirror mechanism.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of periscope mirror mechanism, values: (IN, OUT).

fitsKeyInfo.name: IFSO1POS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of first optics mechanism.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of first optics mechanism, values: (TBD1, TBD2).

fitsKeyInfo.name: IFSO2POS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of second optics mechanism.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of second optics mechanism, values: (TBD1, TBD2).

fitsKeyInfo.name: LLMSKST
fitsKeyInfo.title: The current lenslet mask position.
fitsKeyInfo.description: The current lenslet mask position, values: enum: (FULL_OPEN, SERRATED_WIDE, FINE_MASK, FINE_MASK_CALIBRATION, INTERMEDIATE, UNKNOWN).

fitsKeyInfo.name: SLMSKST
fitsKeyInfo.title: The current slicer mask position.
fitsKeyInfo.description: The current slicer mask position, values: (FULL_OPEN, INTERMEDIATE, HALF, UNKNOWN).

fitsKeyInfo.name: IFSGRTPS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of spectral resolution grating mechanism.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of spectral resolution grating mechanism.

fitsKeyInfo.name: LLMSKPOS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current position name of spectral resolution lenslet mask mechanism.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current position name of spectral resolution lenslet mask mechanism.

fitsKeyInfo.name: OBSID
fitsKeyInfo.title: Observation ID.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Observation ID given by LOAD_CONFIGURATION command.
fitsKeyInfo.note: OBSID and EXPTIme are in the group that are common to all instruments.

fitsKeyInfo.name: EXPTIME
fitsKeyInfo.title: Actual total exposure time.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Actual total exposure time which is rampIntegrationTime multiplied by ramps.

fitsKeyInfo.name: RAMPTIME
fitsKeyInfo.title: Actual integration time of one ramp.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Actual integration time of one ramp. The reuqested integration time is rounded down to the nearest valid integration time which is a multiple of readoutTime.

fitsKeyInfo.name: READTIME
fitsKeyInfo.title: Time to clock one detector.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Time to clock one detector, which is dependent on pixel clocking time and subarray dimensions and channels used.

fitsKeyInfo.name: GAIN
fitsKeyInfo.title: Conversion of photoelectrons to counts for each detector.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Conversion of photoelectrons to counts for each detector.

fitsKeyInfo.name: READNOIS
fitsKeyInfo.title: Nominal read noise of the entire array measured at commissioning phase.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Nominal read noise of the entire array measured at commissioning phase.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IMGTMPXX
fitsKeyInfo.title: ID of the sensor assigned for the temperature reading.
fitsKeyInfo.description: ID of the sensor assigned for the temperature reading.

fitsKeyInfo.name: IFSTMPXX
fitsKeyInfo.title: ID of the sensor assigned for the temperature reading.
fitsKeyInfo.description: ID of the sensor assigned for the temperature reading.

fitsKeyInfo.name: TMPTMP
fitsKeyInfo.title: ID of the sensor assigned for the temperature reading.
fitsKeyInfo.description: ID of the sensor assigned for the temperature reading.

fitsKeyInfo.name: SSLGSALT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current altitude estimated based on measured range distance and the value set for zenith angle.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current altitude estimated based on measured range distance and the value set for zenith angle (= current.rangeDistance*cos(simTcs.zenithAngle)).

fitsKeyInfo.name: SSLGSMAG
fitsKeyInfo.title: Magnitude estimate of the variable intensity NGS sources in R band (TBC), based on manual and motorized attenuator (current.attenuation).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Magnitude estimate of the variable intensity NGS sources in R band (TBC), based on manual and motorized attenuator (current.attenuation).

fitsKeyInfo.name: LGSR0
fitsKeyInfo.title: Fried parameter (r0).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Fried parameter (r0).

fitsKeyInfo.name: LGSTHT0
fitsKeyInfo.title: Isoplanatic angle (θ0).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Isoplanatic angle (θ0).

fitsKeyInfo.name: LGSTHT2
fitsKeyInfo.title: Generalized isoplanatic angle (θ2).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Generalized isoplanatic angle (θ2).

fitsKeyInfo.name: LGSL0
fitsKeyInfo.title: Turbulence outer scale (L0).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Turbulence outer scale (L0).

fitsKeyInfo.name: LGSTAU0
fitsKeyInfo.title: Coherence time (τ0).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Coherence time (τ0).

fitsKeyInfo.name: LGSCN2P
fitsKeyInfo.title: Cn2 turbulence profile (p).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Cn2 turbulence profile (p).

fitsKeyInfo.name: NGSPROF
fitsKeyInfo.title: Ground layer turbulence (p).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Ground layer turbulence (p).

fitsKeyInfo.name: NGSR0
fitsKeyInfo.title: Fried parameter (r0).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Fried parameter (r0).

fitsKeyInfo.name: NGSL0
fitsKeyInfo.title: Turbulence outer scale (L0).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Turbulence outer scale (L0).

fitsKeyInfo.name: NGSTAU0
fitsKeyInfo.title: Coherence time (τ0).
fitsKeyInfo.description: Coherence time (τ0).

fitsKeyInfo.name: AORATEHO
fitsKeyInfo.title: High-order loop rate. In LGS mode this is equal to the LGS WFS frame rate. In NGS or SL mode this is equal to the PWFS frame rate.
fitsKeyInfo.description: High-order loop rate. In LGS mode this is equal to the LGS WFS frame rate. In NGS or SL mode this is equal to the PWFS frame rate.

fitsKeyInfo.name: AORATELO
fitsKeyInfo.title: Low-order loop rate. This is equal to the Tier 1 and 2 steady-state frame rate.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Low-order loop rate. This is equal to the Tier 1 and 2 steady-state frame rate.

fitsKeyInfo.name: AORATELT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Low-order truth loop rate. This is equal to the Tier 3 and 3F steady-state frame rate.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Low-order truth loop rate. This is equal to the Tier 3 and 3F steady-state frame rate.

fitsKeyInfo.name: AORATEWC
fitsKeyInfo.title: Wavefront correction. In LGS mode this should be at least equal to the LGS WFS frame rate. In NGS mode this should be at least equal to the PWFS frame rate. In SL mode his should be at least to the Tier 1 and 2 steady-state frame rate.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Wavefront correction. In LGS mode this should be at least equal to the LGS WFS frame rate. In NGS mode this should be at least equal to the PWFS frame rate. In SL mode his should be at least to the Tier 1 and 2 steady-state frame rate.

fitsKeyInfo.name: AOTIER1
fitsKeyInfo.title: Tier 1 detector assignment.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Tier 1 detector assignment, values: (PWFS, OIWFSA, OIWFSB, OIWFSC).

fitsKeyInfo.name: AOTIER2
fitsKeyInfo.title: Tier 2 detector assignment. The array is ordered Tier 2 [A B].
fitsKeyInfo.description: Tier 2 detector assignment. The array is ordered Tier 2 [A B]. Type is array[2] of enum: (NONE, PWFS, OIWFSA, OIWFSB, OIWFSC, ODGW1, ODGW2, ODGW3, ODGW4).

fitsKeyInfo.name: AOTIER3
fitsKeyInfo.title: Tier 3 detector assignment. The array is ordered Tier 3 [A B C D].
fitsKeyInfo.description: Tier 3 detector assignment. The array is ordered Tier 3 [A B C D]. Type is array[4] of enum: (NONE, OIWFSA, OIWFSB, OIWFSC, ODGW1, ODGW2, ODGW3, ODGW4)

fitsKeyInfo.name: AOTIER3F
fitsKeyInfo.title: Tier 3F detector assignment
fitsKeyInfo.description: Tier 3F detector assignment. Values: (NONE, OIWFSA, OIWFSB, OIWFSC)

fitsKeyInfo.name: ODGWIMEL
fitsKeyInfo.title: Ellipticity value based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile, i.e., ratio between σ1 and σ2 of the ellipse.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Ellipticity value based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile, i.e., ratio between σ1 and σ2 of the ellipse.

fitsKeyInfo.name: ODGWIMS1
fitsKeyInfo.title: Image size 1 (σ1) based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Image size 1 (σ1) based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile.

fitsKeyInfo.name: ODGWIMS2
fitsKeyInfo.title: Image size 2 (σ2) based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Image size 2 (σ2) based on the averaged spot ellipticity profile.

fitsKeyInfo.name: ODGWIMRT
fitsKeyInfo.title: Image rotation angle between the unrotated elliptical coordinate system and the local detector coordinate system.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Image rotation angle between the unrotated elliptical coordinate system and the local detector coordinate system.

fitsKeyInfo.name: AOISMST
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current ISM selection.
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current ISM selection. Values: enum: (BOTTOM, SIDE, TOP, INTERMEDIATE, UNKNOWN)

fitsKeyInfo.name: AODM0TM
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current temperature of DM0
fitsKeyInfo.description: Current temperature of DM0

fitsKeyInfo.name: AODM11TM
fitsKeyInfo.title: Current temperature of DM11
